sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Moviedetails = () => { const params=useParams(); const [movie,setmovie]=useState([]); const getmoviedata=async()=> { const res=await axios.get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/${params.id}?api_key=872b6f6702d22707bd5586523dc92a11&language=ar-US`) setmovie(res.data) } useEffect(()=>{ getmoviedata(); },[]) return (
) } export default Moviedetails
